content.rendered:
Welcome to the second year Fold, the first of your weekly Paprika!
A running record quick enough to keep pace with life in Rudolph,
find on this sheet the beat to which our opinions can meet. A year of
big exhibitions, a transition at the top, and a possible economic flop,
on this page we work together to make sense of it. Supported this
fall by coordinating editors STERNAD and KEMPER, financed by
FEINMESSER and web designed by ANNE MA, each lecture Thursday
teams of issue editors from every program and year will tell you what you
missed, curate some voices, and delve into themes of their choice. This
week the class of 2017 catches us up on what happened over the summer
and introduces the class of 2018.
